name: Add Plan Year For Employer

elements.name: Setup site, employer

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
ABC Widgets employer has a staff role
staff role person logged in
update rating area

elements.name: Adding a new plan year

steps.name: 0.5 is updated on benefit market catalog
ABC Widgets is logged in and on the home page
staff role person clicked on benefits tab
employer should see add plan year button
employer clicked on add plan year button
employer should see continue button disabled
employer filled all the fields on benefit application form
employer clicked on continue button
employer should see form for benefit package
employer filled all the fields on benefit package form
employer selected by metal level plan offerings
employer should see gold metal level type
employer clicked on gold metal level
employer should see create plan year button disabled
employer selected 100 contribution percent for the application
employer should see your estimated montly cost
employer clicked on create plan year button
employer should see a draft benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market

update rating area

employer should see add plan year button
employer clicked on add plan year button
employer should see continue button disabled
employer filled all the fields on benefit application form
employer clicked on continue button
employer should see form for benefit package
employer filled all the fields on benefit package form
employer selected by metal level plan offerings
employer should see gold metal level type
employer clicked on gold metal level
employer should see create plan year button disabled
employer selected 100 contribution percent for the application
employer should see your estimated montly cost
employer should see that the create plan year is true

name: As an admin user I should not have the ability to extend the OE
description: of a given Employer with a active enrollment.

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for active initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
initial employer ABC Widgets has active benefit application

elements.name: As an HBX Staff with Super Admin subroles I should not be able to extend Open Enrollment for an Employer with a active benefit application

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will not see the Extend Open Enrollment button

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and enrolling/renewing benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for enrollment_open initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
initial employer ABC Widgets has enrollment_open benefit application

elements.name: As an HBX Staff with Super Admin subroles I want to extend Open Enrollment for an Employer with an Enrolling/Renewing_Enrolling benefit application

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user clicks Extend Open Enrollment
the user clicks Edit Open Enrollment
the Choose New Open Enrollment Date panel is presented
the user enters a new open enrollment end date
the user clicks Extend Open Enrollment button
a Successfully extended employer(s) open enrollment success message will display.

elements.name: As an HBX Staff with Super Admin subroles I should <action> force publish button based on <date_to_compare_with> and publish_due_day_of_month of benefit application

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the system date is greater than the earliest_start_prior_to_effective_on
the system date is less than the publish_due_day_of_month
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will not see the Force Publish button

elements.name: As an HBX Staff with Super Admin subroles I should <action> force publish button based on <date_to_compare_with> and publish_due_day_of_month of benefit application

the system date is less than the monthly_open_enrollment_end_on
the system date is greater than the publish_due_day_of_month

the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will see the Force Publish button

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for draft initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
initial employer ABC Widgets has draft benefit application

elements.name: Draft application published between submission deadline & application effective date

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the system date is less than the earliest_start_prior_to_effective_on
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
ABC widgets FTE count is less than or equal to shop:small_market_employee_count_maximum
ABC widgets primary address state is MA
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will see the Force Publish button
the user clicks on Force Publish button
the user clicks submit to confirm force publish
the force publish successful message should be displayed

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

benefit market catalog exists for draft initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets

elements.name: Draft application published between submission deadline & application effective date

comments.value: # And ask to confirm intention to publish.

steps.name: that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the system date is less than the earliest_start_prior_to_effective_on
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
ABC widgets FTE count is more than to shop:small_market_employee_count_maximum
ABC widgets primary address state is MA
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user clicks on Force Publish button
the user clicks submit to confirm force publish
a more than warning message will appear

name: As an admin user I should have the ability to terminate a given Employer with a active benefit application.

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for active initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
initial employer ABC Widgets has active benefit application
that a user with a HBX staff role with Super Admin subrole exists and is logged in
the user is on the Employer Index of the Admin Dashboard
the user clicks Action for that Employer
the user will see the Plan Years button
the user will select benefit application to terminate
the user clicks Actions for that benefit application
the user will see Terminate button

elements.name: As an HBX Staff with Super Admin subroles I should be able to terminate an benefit application

steps.name: the user enters any_day and other details for voluntary termination
user clicks submit button
user should see termination successful message
user logs out

name: Employee termination and Re-hire functionality

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for active initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer ABC Widgets
ABC Widgets employer has a staff role
initial employer ABC Widgets has active benefit application
there are 2 employees for ABC Widgets
Employees for ABC Widgets have both Benefit Group Assignments Employee role

elements.name: Successful termination and rehire of an employee

steps.name: staff role person logged in
ABC Widgets employer visit the Employee Roster
employer clicks on Actions drop down for one of active employee
employer should see the terminate button
employer clicks on terminate button
employer should see Enter termination date to remove text
employer clicks on Terminate Employee button with date as pastdate
employer should see the terminated success flash notice
employer clicks on button terminated for datatable
employer clicks on Actions drop down for one of terminated employee
employer clicks on rehire button
employer clicks on submit button by entering todays date
employer should see the rehired success flash notice

name: Census Employee COBRA functionality

elements.name: Setup site, employer, and benefit application

steps.name: a CCA site exists with a benefit market
benefit market catalog exists for active initial employer with health benefits
there is an employer EnterPrise Limited
EnterPrise Limited employer has a staff role
there is 1 employee for EnterPrise Limited

elements.name: Employer terminates and Initiate COBRA to Unlinked employee

steps.name: staff role person logged in
EnterPrise Limited employer terminates employees
EnterPrise Limited employer visit the Employee Roster
employer clicks on terminated filter
employer clicks on Actions drop down for one of active employee
employer should see the Initiate cobra button
employer clicks on Initiate cobra button
employer should see Enter effective date for Initiate cobra Action
employer should see default cobra start date
employer sets cobra start date to two months after termination date
EnterPrise Limited employer clicks on Initiate COBRA button
employer should see the Initiate cobra success flash notice
employer clicks on all employees
employer should see census employee status as Cobra eligible

EnterPrise Limited employer clicks on Initiate COBRA button
employer should see the Initiate cobra success flash notice
employer clicks on all employees
employer should see census employee status as Cobra Enrolled
